games.title: Super Mario Odyssey
games.description: Join Mario and his new companion Cappy on a globe-trotting 3D adventure.

games.title: Assassin's Creed Valhalla
games.description: Assassin's Creed Valhalla is an action role-playing video game developed by Ubisoft Montreal and published by Ubisoft. It is the twelfth major installment and the twenty-second release in the Assassin's Creed series, and a successor to the 2018 game Assassin's Creed Odyssey.

games.title: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild
games.description: Explore the vast open world of Hyrule in this critically acclaimed adventure game.

games.title: Red Dead Redemption 2
games.description: Experience the epic story of outlaw Arthur Morgan and the Van der Linde gang in the Wild West.

games.title: Overwatch
games.description: Fight for the future in this team-based shooter set on a near-future Earth.

games.title: FIFA 22
games.description: Experience the excitement of football with authentic gameplay, teams, and players.

games.title: The Last of Us Part II
games.description: The game is set five years after the events of The Last of Us (2013), players control 19-year-old Ellie, who comes into conflict with a mysterious cult in a post-apocalyptic United States.

games.title: Ori and the Will of the Wisps
games.description: The little spirit Ori is no stranger to peril, but when a fateful flight puts the owlet Ku in harm's way, it will take more than bravery to bring a family back together, heal the broken land of Niwen, and discover Ori's true destiny.

games.title: God of War
games.description: God of War is an action-adventure game that follows Kratos, a Spartan warrior who seeks to start a new life with his son Atreus, after the death of his wife. The game takes place in Norse mythology and features various mythological creatures and gods.

games.title: State of Decay 2
games.description: State of Decay 2 is an open-world survival game that takes place in a zombie apocalypse. Players must manage a community of survivors, scavenge for resources, and build up their base while facing various threats from zombies and other survivors.

games.title: Sniper Elite 4
games.description: Sniper Elite 4 is a third-person tactical shooter game that takes place during World War II. Players control Karl Fairburne, an elite sniper who must complete various missions behind enemy lines. The game features realistic ballistics and a slow-motion X-Ray kill cam that shows the internal damage caused by the player's shots.

games.title: A New Game
